item.title: Megaliner Turkish Style 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 7, 2025

Megaliner Turkish Style 1.54 ETS2

our megaliner package
2 curtains
1 open curtain
Consists of 1 raft trailer
with full accessories
The trailers you purchase have their own loads.

Tuning All Truck & Trailer Package 1.49
Tuning Pack Trailer Slot 1.49
Krone DLC gerektirir

Tested 1.54-1.55

Enjoy the mod!

Credits: Scs,Blade1974

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Jeep Wrangler 2022 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 7, 2025

Jeep Wrangler 2022 1.54 ETS2

Specifications:
– Very high-quality exterior & interior
– Option of Rim paintable
– It has more Animations like Stick wipers and stick lights
– Access: Roof and extra Lights and Bicycle and extra wheel
– I added lights interior custome just Pross ” O ”
– Excellent driveability, improved engine and physics
– Openable Front Windows
– Wipers work accurately
– I added A new Engine Sound, which is very nice
– Top Speed: 205KH
– 6th gear
Truck Dealers > Access Mod Dealer > Jeep

Credits: Gaza

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Truck Skins Pack v1.1 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 7, 2025

The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Truck Skins Pack v1.1 ATS

The Godfather’s Kenworth T Series Truck Skins Pack

The Kenworth Skins pack is built by The Godfather’s Mods Company and covers over Modded Kenworth Trucks in American Truck Simulator for the T909 / T908 RTA / T609 RTA / T610GTM / T680 SCS Software Truck & T680 Next Gen SCS Software Truck

v1.0 (Release Edition)
The Launch edition has a bunch of skins over a wide range of T Series Kenworth Trucks

V1.1 Update (May 2025)
This Update Adds the 1st wave of Kenworth T408SAR & T409SAR Skins Plus the Return of some T908 RTA Skins & new skins for the T909 / T609 & T610GTM Trucks also updated to the pack to work with the 1.54 ATS Update also the T680 Next Gen skins have been removed due to me losing the XML File for the T680 Next Gen truck also all T609RTA Skins have been removed due to mod studio 2 update screwing the way they do skinning.

Skins that are in this mod pack are listed below

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SRI Lightbox Pack v1.9 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 7, 2025

SRI Lightbox Pack v1.9 1.54 ETS2

Contents:
SRI AeroSignLED (125×30, 140×40)
SRI AeroSlimLED (125×30, 160×30)
SRI ClassicSignLED (130×20, 130×30, 140×40)
SRI FrontSignLED (138×23 Next Gen, 175×31 RJL, 180×28 Next Gen)
SRI TripleSignLED (97×26 BRED LAST, LANG LAST + custom, both painted and aluminium)
Templates

Supported trucks:
SCS Scania NG/PGRS Eugene
S Scania Next Gen Longline by Skimo
RJL Scania G,R,R4,T,T4
Volvo FH3 by Johnny244
DAF 2021 by Jasper
SCS MAN TGX TG3
SCS Volvo FH4/5/6 Aero, Sanax Free/Premium
Ford F-MAX

Compatible with 1.54

Credits: JSTruckstyling
